dict.string: C11S House would like to access your HomeKit data to find existing named rooms and devices, making it easier to set up your conscious house.
C11S House needs speech recognition to understand your voice commands and make your house truly interactive.
C11S House needs access to your microphone to hear your voice commands and respond to you.
C11S House needs your location to provide accurate weather information and personalize your home's name based on your address.
